00048 void dump_requests(char *prefix, struct coordinator *cdt)
00049 {
00050         struct cdt_agent_req    *car;
00051 
00052         down_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00053         list_for_each_entry(car, &cdt->cdt_requests, car_request_list) {
00054                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%s fid="DFID" dfid="DFID
00055                        " compound/cookie="LPX64"/"LPX64
00056                        " action=%s archive#=%d flags="LPX64
00057                        " extent="LPX64"-"LPX64
00058                        " gid="LPX64" refcount=%d canceled=%d\n",
00059                        prefix, PFID(&car->car_hai->hai_fid),
00060                        PFID(&car->car_hai->hai_dfid),
00061                        car->car_compound_id, car->car_hai->hai_cookie,
00062                        hsm_copytool_action2name(car->car_hai->hai_action),
00063                        car->car_archive_id, car->car_flags,
00064                        car->car_hai->hai_extent.offset,
00065                        car->car_hai->hai_extent.length,
00066                        car->car_hai->hai_gid,
00067                        atomic_read(&car->car_refcount),
00068                        car->car_canceled);
00069         }
00070         up_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00071 }
00072 
00073 struct req_interval_data {
00074         struct cdt_req_progress *crp;
00075         __u64                    done_sz;
00076 };
00077 
00081 static enum interval_iter req_interval_cb(struct interval_node *node,
00082                                           void *args)
00083 {
00084         struct req_interval_data        *data;
00085         ENTRY;
00086 
00087         data = args;
00088         data->done_sz += node->in_extent.end - node->in_extent.start;
00089         RETURN(INTERVAL_ITER_CONT);
00090 }
00091 
00098 void mdt_cdt_get_work_done(struct cdt_agent_req *car, __u64 *done_sz)
00099 {
00100         struct req_interval_data         rid;
00101         struct cdt_req_progress         *crp = &car->car_progress;
00102 
00103         mutex_lock(&crp->crp_lock);
00104 
00105         rid.crp = crp;
00106         rid.done_sz = 0;
00107         interval_iterate(crp->crp_root, req_interval_cb, &rid);
00108         *done_sz = rid.done_sz;
00109 
00110         mutex_unlock(&crp->crp_lock);
00111 }
00112 
00113 #define NODE_VECTOR_SZ 256
00114 
00117 static void mdt_cdt_free_request_tree(struct cdt_req_progress *crp)
00118 {
00119         struct interval_node    *node, *vn;
00120         int                      i;
00121         ENTRY;
00122 
00123         mutex_lock(&crp->crp_lock);
00124 
00125         if (crp->crp_max == 0)
00126                 goto out;
00127 
00128         /* remove all nodes from tree */
00129         for (i = 0 ; i < crp->crp_cnt ; i++) {
00130                 vn = crp->crp_node[i / NODE_VECTOR_SZ];
00131                 node = &vn[i % NODE_VECTOR_SZ];
00132                 interval_erase(node, &crp->crp_root);
00133         }
00134         /* free all sub vectors */
00135         for (i = 0 ; i <= crp->crp_max / NODE_VECTOR_SZ ; i++)
00136                 OBD_FREE(crp->crp_node[i],
00137                          NODE_VECTOR_SZ * sizeof(crp->crp_node[i][0]));
00138 
00139         /* free main vector */
00140         OBD_FREE(crp->crp_node,
00141                  sizeof(crp->crp_node[0]) *
00142                   (crp->crp_max / NODE_VECTOR_SZ + 1));
00143 
00144         crp->crp_cnt = 0;
00145         crp->crp_max = 0;
00146 out:
00147         mutex_unlock(&crp->crp_lock);
00148         EXIT;
00149 }
00150 
00154 static int hsm_update_work(struct cdt_req_progress *crp,
00155                            const struct hsm_extent *extent)
00156 {
00157         int                       rc, osz, nsz;
00158         struct interval_node    **new_vv;
00159         struct interval_node     *v, *node;
00160         __u64                     end;
00161         ENTRY;
00162 
00163         end = extent->offset + extent->length;
00164         if (end <= extent->offset)
00165                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00166 
00167         mutex_lock(&crp->crp_lock);
00168         /* new node index */
00169 
00170         if (crp->crp_cnt >= crp->crp_max) {
00171                 /* no more room */
00172                 /* allocate a new vector */
00173                 OBD_ALLOC(v, NODE_VECTOR_SZ * sizeof(v[0]));
00174                 if (v == NULL)
00175                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00176 
00177                 if (crp->crp_max == 0)
00178                         osz = 0;
00179                 else
00180                         osz = sizeof(new_vv[0]) *
00181                               (crp->crp_max / NODE_VECTOR_SZ + 1);
00182 
00183                 nsz = osz + sizeof(new_vv[0]);
00184                 /* increase main vector size */
00185                 OBD_ALLOC(new_vv, nsz);
00186                 if (new_vv == NULL) {
00187                         OBD_FREE(v, NODE_VECTOR_SZ * sizeof(v[0]));
00188                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 if (osz == 0) {
00192                         crp->crp_max = NODE_VECTOR_SZ - 1;
00193                 } else {
00194                         memcpy(new_vv, crp->crp_node, osz);
00195                         OBD_FREE(crp->crp_node, osz);
00196                         crp->crp_max += NODE_VECTOR_SZ;
00197                 }
00198 
00199                 crp->crp_node = new_vv;
00200                 crp->crp_node[crp->crp_max / NODE_VECTOR_SZ] = v;
00201         }
00202 
00203         v = crp->crp_node[crp->crp_cnt / NODE_VECTOR_SZ];
00204         node = &v[crp->crp_cnt % NODE_VECTOR_SZ];
00205         interval_set(node, extent->offset, end);
00206         /* try to insert, if entry already exist ignore the new one
00207          * it can happen if ct sends 2 times the same progress */
00208         if (interval_insert(node, &crp->crp_root) == NULL)
00209                 crp->crp_cnt++;
00210 
00211         rc = 0;
00212 out:
00213         mutex_unlock(&crp->crp_lock);
00214         RETURN(rc);
00215 }
00216 
00220 static void mdt_cdt_init_request_tree(struct cdt_req_progress *crp)
00221 {
00222         mutex_init(&crp->crp_lock);
00223         crp->crp_root = NULL;
00224         crp->crp_cnt = 0;
00225         crp->crp_max = 0;
00226 }
00227 
00238 struct cdt_agent_req *mdt_cdt_alloc_request(__u64 compound_id, __u32 archive_id,
00239                                             __u64 flags, struct obd_uuid *uuid,
00240                                             struct hsm_action_item *hai)
00241 {
00242         struct cdt_agent_req *car;
00243         ENTRY;
00244 
00245         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR(car, mdt_hsm_car_kmem);
00246         if (car == NULL)
00247                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00248 
00249         atomic_set(&car->car_refcount, 1);
00250         car->car_compound_id = compound_id;
00251         car->car_archive_id = archive_id;
00252         car->car_flags = flags;
00253         car->car_canceled = 0;
00254         car->car_req_start = cfs_time_current_sec();
00255         car->car_req_update = car->car_req_start;
00256         car->car_uuid = *uuid;
00257         OBD_ALLOC(car->car_hai, hai->hai_len);
00258         if (car->car_hai == NULL) {
00259                 OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(car, mdt_hsm_car_kmem);
00260                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00261         }
00262         memcpy(car->car_hai, hai, hai->hai_len);
00263         mdt_cdt_init_request_tree(&car->car_progress);
00264 
00265         RETURN(car);
00266 }
00267 
00273 void mdt_cdt_free_request(struct cdt_agent_req *car)
00274 {
00275         mdt_cdt_free_request_tree(&car->car_progress);
00276         OBD_FREE(car->car_hai, car->car_hai->hai_len);
00277         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(car, mdt_hsm_car_kmem);
00278 }
00279 
00284 void mdt_cdt_get_request(struct cdt_agent_req *car)
00285 {
00286         atomic_inc(&car->car_refcount);
00287 }
00288 
00294 void mdt_cdt_put_request(struct cdt_agent_req *car)
00295 {
00296         LASSERT(atomic_read(&car->car_refcount) > 0);
00297         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&car->car_refcount))
00298                 mdt_cdt_free_request(car);
00299 }
00300 
00309 static struct cdt_agent_req *cdt_find_request_nolock(struct coordinator *cdt,
00310                                                      __u64 cookie,
00311                                                      const struct lu_fid *fid)
00312 {
00313         struct cdt_agent_req *car;
00314         struct cdt_agent_req *found = NULL;
00315         ENTRY;
00316 
00317         list_for_each_entry(car, &cdt->cdt_requests, car_request_list) {
00318                 if (car->car_hai->hai_cookie == cookie ||
00319                     (fid != NULL && lu_fid_eq(fid, &car->car_hai->hai_fid))) {
00320                         mdt_cdt_get_request(car);
00321                         found = car;
00322                         break;
00323                 }
00324         }
00325 
00326         RETURN(found);
00327 }
00328 
00336 int mdt_cdt_add_request(struct coordinator *cdt, struct cdt_agent_req *new_car)
00337 {
00338         struct cdt_agent_req    *car;
00339         ENTRY;
00340 
00341         /* cancel requests are not kept in memory */
00342         LASSERT(new_car->car_hai->hai_action != HSMA_CANCEL);
00343 
00344         down_write(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00345         car = cdt_find_request_nolock(cdt, new_car->car_hai->hai_cookie, NULL);
00346         if (car != NULL) {
00347                 mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
00348                 up_write(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00349                 RETURN(-EEXIST);
00350         }
00351 
00352         list_add_tail(&new_car->car_request_list, &cdt->cdt_requests);
00353         up_write(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00354 
00355         mdt_hsm_agent_update_statistics(cdt, 0, 0, 1, &new_car->car_uuid);
00356 
00357         atomic_inc(&cdt->cdt_request_count);
00358 
00359         RETURN(0);
00360 }
00361 
00369 struct cdt_agent_req *mdt_cdt_find_request(struct coordinator *cdt,
00370                                            const __u64 cookie,
00371                                            const struct lu_fid *fid)
00372 {
00373         struct cdt_agent_req    *car;
00374         ENTRY;
00375 
00376         down_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00377         car = cdt_find_request_nolock(cdt, cookie, fid);
00378         up_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00379 
00380         RETURN(car);
00381 }
00382 
00389 int mdt_cdt_remove_request(struct coordinator *cdt, __u64 cookie)
00390 {
00391         struct cdt_agent_req *car;
00392         ENTRY;
00393 
00394         down_write(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00395         car = cdt_find_request_nolock(cdt, cookie, NULL);
00396         if (car != NULL) {
00397                 list_del(&car->car_request_list);
00398                 up_write(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00399 
00400                 /* reference from cdt_requests list */
00401                 mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
00402 
00403                 /* reference from cdt_find_request_nolock() */
00404                 mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
00405 
00406                 LASSERT(atomic_read(&cdt->cdt_request_count) >= 1);
00407                 atomic_dec(&cdt->cdt_request_count);
00408 
00409                 RETURN(0);
00410         }
00411         up_write(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00412 
00413         RETURN(-ENOENT);
00414 }
00415 
00424 struct cdt_agent_req *mdt_cdt_update_request(struct coordinator *cdt,
00425                                           const struct hsm_progress_kernel *pgs)
00426 {
00427         struct cdt_agent_req    *car;
00428         int                      rc;
00429         ENTRY;
00430 
00431         car = mdt_cdt_find_request(cdt, pgs->hpk_cookie, NULL);
00432         if (car == NULL)
00433                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOENT));
00434 
00435         car->car_req_update = cfs_time_current_sec();
00436 
00437         /* update progress done by copy tool */
00438         if (pgs->hpk_errval == 0 && pgs->hpk_extent.length != 0) {
00439                 rc = hsm_update_work(&car->car_progress, &pgs->hpk_extent);
00440                 if (rc) {
00441                         mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
00442                         RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
00443                 }
00444         }
00445 
00446         if (pgs->hpk_flags & HP_FLAG_COMPLETED) {
00447                 if (pgs->hpk_errval != 0)
00448                         mdt_hsm_agent_update_statistics(cdt, 0, 1, 0,
00449                                                         &car->car_uuid);
00450                 else
00451                         mdt_hsm_agent_update_statistics(cdt, 1, 0, 0,
00452                                                         &car->car_uuid);
00453         }
00454         RETURN(car);
00455 }
00456 
00460 static void *mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_start(struct seq_file *s, loff_t *p)
00461 {
00462         struct mdt_device       *mdt = s->private;
00463         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00464         struct list_head        *pos;
00465         loff_t                   i;
00466         ENTRY;
00467 
00468         down_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00469 
00470         if (list_empty(&cdt->cdt_requests))
00471                 RETURN(NULL);
00472 
00473         if (*p == 0)
00474                 RETURN(SEQ_START_TOKEN);
00475 
00476         i = 0;
00477         list_for_each(pos, &cdt->cdt_requests) {
00478                 i++;
00479                 if (i >= *p)
00480                         RETURN(pos);
00481         }
00482         RETURN(NULL);
00483 }
00484 
00489 static void *mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_next(struct seq_file *s, void *v,
00490                                                loff_t *p)
00491 {
00492         struct mdt_device       *mdt = s->private;
00493         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00494         struct list_head        *pos = v;
00495         ENTRY;
00496 
00497         if (pos == SEQ_START_TOKEN)
00498                 pos = cdt->cdt_requests.next;
00499         else
00500                 pos = pos->next;
00501 
00502         (*p)++;
00503         if (pos != &cdt->cdt_requests)
00504                 RETURN(pos);
00505         else
00506                 RETURN(NULL);
00507 }
00508 
00512 static int mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_show(struct seq_file *s, void *v)
00513 {
00514         struct list_head        *pos = v;
00515         struct cdt_agent_req    *car;
00516         char                     buf[12];
00517         __u64                    data_moved;
00518         ENTRY;
00519 
00520         if (pos == SEQ_START_TOKEN)
00521                 RETURN(0);
00522 
00523         car = list_entry(pos, struct cdt_agent_req, car_request_list);
00524         mdt_cdt_get_work_done(car, &data_moved);
00525 
00526         seq_printf(s, "fid="DFID" dfid="DFID
00527                    " compound/cookie="LPX64"/"LPX64
00528                    " action=%s archive#=%d flags="LPX64
00529                    " extent="LPX64"-"LPX64" gid="LPX64
00530                    " data=[%s] canceled=%d uuid=%s done="LPU64"\n",
00531                    PFID(&car->car_hai->hai_fid),
00532                    PFID(&car->car_hai->hai_dfid),
00533                    car->car_compound_id, car->car_hai->hai_cookie,
00534                    hsm_copytool_action2name(car->car_hai->hai_action),
00535                    car->car_archive_id, car->car_flags,
00536                    car->car_hai->hai_extent.offset,
00537                    car->car_hai->hai_extent.length,
00538                    car->car_hai->hai_gid,
00539                    hai_dump_data_field(car->car_hai, buf, sizeof(buf)),
00540                    car->car_canceled, obd_uuid2str(&car->car_uuid),
00541                    data_moved);
00542         RETURN(0);
00543 }
00544 
00548 static void mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_stop(struct seq_file *s, void *v)
00549 {
00550         struct mdt_device       *mdt = s->private;
00551         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00552         ENTRY;
00553 
00554         up_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00555 
00556         EXIT;
00557 }
00558 
00559 /* hsm agent list proc functions */
00560 static const struct seq_operations mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_ops = {
00561         .start          = mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_start,
00562         .next           = mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_next,
00563         .show           = mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_show,
00564         .stop           = mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_stop,
00565 };
00566 
00571 static int lprocfs_open_hsm_active_requests(struct inode *inode,
00572                                             struct file *file)
00573 {
00574         struct seq_file *s;
00575         int              rc;
00576         ENTRY;
00577 
00578         rc = seq_open(file, &mdt_hsm_active_requests_proc_ops);
00579         if (rc) {
00580                 RETURN(rc);
00581         }
00582         s = file->private_data;
00583         s->private = PDE_DATA(inode);
00584 
00585         RETURN(rc);
00586 }
00587 
00588 /* methods to access hsm request list */
00589 const struct file_operations mdt_hsm_active_requests_fops = {
00590         .owner          = THIS_MODULE,
00591         .open           = lprocfs_open_hsm_active_requests,
00592         .read           = seq_read,
00593         .llseek         = seq_lseek,
00594         .release        = lprocfs_seq_release,
00595 };
